壤.definition: (bound form) soil; earth; (literary) the earth (contrasted with heaven 天[tian1])

壤塘.definition: Zamthang County in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang Autonomous Prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1ba4 Zang4zu2 Qiang1zu2 Zi4zhi4zhou1], northwest Sichuan

壤塘縣.definition: Zamthang County in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang Autonomous Prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1ba4 Zang4zu2 Qiang1zu2 Zi4zhi4zhou1], northwest Sichuan
